title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.

a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.

It is suggested to:
i. Merge the first and second column.
j. Perform duplicated name validation on the first page.
OB:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Observe the size of the buttons.
3. Observe the initial selected table entry in the dialog.
4. Change a parameter name to something very long.
5. Observe the preview to see if it is cut off.
6. Test the dialog with a method that has many parameters and observe the size of the dialog.
